20110113023904.000|20110113023906.000|CC1|SCRATCHED HER NOSE AND SHE'S PUT

20110113023907.000|20110113023909.000|CC1|SQUEEZED HER HAND.

20110113023913.000|20110113023914.000|CC1|WE'LL JUST HAVE TO SEE AS THESE 
20110113023914.000|20110113023916.000|CC1|NEXT FEW CRITICAL DAYS GO ON HOW
20110113023916.000|20110113023918.000|CC1|IT DEVELOPS.                    
20110113023918.000|20110113023919.000|CC1|BUT IT'S BEEN REALLY DIFFICULT,
